contexts.context: ...bravura »stunts« of German criticism. No <mark>matter</mark> how many comedies one may write, still it...
..., in that we obey it. Suffering, no <mark>matter</mark> how great, will burst forth in a cry...
...leidlicher Abfall, Husten und Unruhe von Anbeginn, <mark>matter</mark> Beifall nach 2. u 3. Akt mit Widerspruch;...
